TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class AudioPresentation : Java.Lang.Object, Android.OS.IParcelable, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AudioPresentation extends Java.Lang.Object implements class Android.OS.IParcelable, class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type AudioPresentation = class inherit Object interface IParcelable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: The AudioPresentation class encapsulates the information that describes an audio presentation which is available in next generation audio content.

remarks.para:
The AudioPresentation class encapsulates the information that describes an audio presentation which is available in next generation audio content.
Used by MediaExtractorMediaExtractor#getAudioPresentations(int) and AudioTrackAudioTrack#setPresentation(AudioPresentation) to query available presentations and to select one, respectively.
A list of available audio presentations in a media source can be queried using MediaExtractor#getAudioPresentations(int). This list can be presented to a user for selection. An AudioPresentation can be passed to an offloaded audio decoder via AudioTrack#setPresentation(AudioPresentation) to request decoding of the selected presentation. An audio stream may contain multiple presentations that differ by language, accessibility, end point mastering and dialogue enhancement. An audio presentation may also have a set of description labels in different languages to help the user to make an informed selection.
Applications that parse media streams and extract presentation information on their own can create instances of AudioPresentation by using AudioPresentation.Builder class.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.value: a map of available text labels for this presentation. Each label is indexed by its locale corresponding to the language code as specified by ISO 639-2. Either ISO 639-2/B or ISO 639-2/T could be used.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.value: the locale corresponding to audio presentation's ISO 639-1/639-2 language code.

Docs.summary: Returns presentation ID used by the framework to select an audio presentation rendered by a decoder.

remarks.para: Returns presentation ID used by the framework to select an audio presentation rendered by a decoder. Presentation ID is typically sequential, but does not have to be.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Unknown audio presentation ID, this indicates audio presentation ID is not selected.

remarks.para: Unknown audio presentation ID, this indicates audio presentation ID is not selected.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns program ID used by the framework to select an audio presentation rendered by a decoder.

remarks.para: Returns program ID used by the framework to select an audio presentation rendered by a decoder. Program ID can be used to further uniquely identify the presentation to a decoder.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
